description:
Subaru has a new classmate. Even though she`s super pretty, Mizuki isn`t too concerned, because he isn`t interested in 3D girls. But this one girl knows what to say to get his attention.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nazo no Bishoujo Tenkousei / Ki ni Naru Futari
The Mysterious Cute Transfer Girl / A Curious Couple
الطالبة الحسناء المنتقلة الغامضة / الثنائي المثير للفضول
謎の美少女転校生 / 気になる2人
